text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Manabí | official_name = Province of Manabí | settlement_type = Province | image_flag = Bandera Provincia Manabí.svg | image_seal = | image_shield = | image_map = Manabi in Ecuador (+Galapagos).svg | map_caption = Location of Manabí Province in Ecuador. | image_map1 = Cantones de Manabí.png | map_caption1 = Cantons of Manabí Province | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Ecuador | established_title = Established | established_date = June 25, 1824 | seat_type = Capital | seat = Portoviejo | parts_type = Cantons | parts_style = coll | parts = | leader_party = | leader_title = Provincial Prefect | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_total_km2 = 18939.60 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_m = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = INEC.gob.ec | population_total = 1369780 | population_as_of = 2010 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_urban = 615491 | timezone1 = ECT | utc_offset1 = -5 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | registration_plate = M | website = }} Manabí is a province in Ecuador. The capital city is Portoviejo. == Cantons == The province is divided into 22 cantons. The following table lists each with its population at the 2001 census, its area in square kilometers (km²), and the name of the canton seat or capital.Cantons of Ecuador. statoids.com.
